author: Sean O'Kane
title: Tesla cutting salaries and furloughing workers to ‘manage costs’ during pandemic
description: With its US factories and offices shut down due to the novel coronavirus, Tesla is now cutting full-time employees’ pay through the end of June and placing hourly workers on unpaid leave. It’s the latest sign of economic stress being caused by the pandemic.
content:
The pay cuts will last through the end of June
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
